name: 2D JUMP GUY
description:
Hey, this is the first video game I've ever made. 

Just as a prototype to learn and understand how the Godot game engine works. I look forward to uploading more small projects before making something larger at a later date. 

If you've randomly stumbled across this and decide to play it, thank you. 

Controls:

A - Walk left

D - Walk right

SPACE - Jump

W - Climb ladders

R - Respawn
